actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of the Shippensburg Public Library, the Osterhout Library, the West Pittston Library, the West Shore Public Library, the Milton Public Library, and the Himmelreich Library.

summary.text: Relieves the following libraries of liability in the amounts stated for allegedly wrongful payments by the Federal Disaster Assistance Administration: (1) Shippensburg Public Library, Shippensburg, Pennsylvania - $12,827, (2) Osterhout Library, Wilkes-Barre, Pennsylvania - $447,834, (3) West Pittston Library, West Pittston, Pennsylvania $9,984, (4) West Shore Public Library, Camp Hill, Pennsylvania - $26,772, (5) Milton Public Library, Milton, Pennsylvania - $21,869, and (6) Himmelreich Library, Lewisburg, Pennsylvania $21,869.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of the Shippensburg Public Library, the Osterhout Library, the West Pittston Library, the West Shore Public Library, the Milton Public Library, and the Himmelreich Library.
